attributes.description:
The All-new Peugeot 2008 1.2T GT Auto delivers a masterful power and efficiency. It has a striking front grille, a horizontal bonnet, raised ground clearance and an enhanced and sophisticated design.
Be the first in your city to hit the road in Peugeots latest and greatest creation.
This great vehicle comes with a 5 year or 100 000kms warranty and a 3 year or 60 000kms service plan.

A clever central storage compartment frees up space at the front of the vehicle, while the front door pockets also offer generous storage compartments. This vehicle comes with a 5 year or 100 000kms warranty, roadside assistance and service plan. Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
